ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to include canaryseed under the Canada Grain Act which would ensure that canaryseed producers are eligible for compensation under the Canada Grain Commissionâ€™s Safeguards for Grain Farmers Licensing and Payment Protection Program and for its grain quality assurance services.
